concept.description: Labels the module com.buschmais.cdo.spi as MODULE and CDO_SPI.
concept.cypher: MATCH (package:PACKAGE) WHERE package.FQN = "com.buschmais.cdo.spi" SET package:MODULE:CDO_SPI RETURN package

constraint.description: The module "cdo.inject" must only have dependencies to "cdo.api".
constraint.cypher: MATCH (module:MODULE:CDO_SPI)-[:CONTAINS*]->(type:TYPE), (otherModule:MODULE)-[:CONTAINS*]->(otherType:TYPE), (type)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(otherType:TYPE) WHERE module<>otherModule AND NOT ( otherModule:CDO_API ) RETURN type as Type, otherType as OtherType
